get.summary: returns a list of all assigned tasks
get.description: Retrieves a list of all assigned tasks.

200.description: a list of all assigned tasks joined with their tasks, those tasks' targets, and the assigned tasks' persons.

personId.description: The ID of the person assigned to the assigned task.

taskId.description: The ID of the task for the assigned task.

type.description: The schedule type of the assigned task. In ['DAILY', 'WEEKLY', 'BIWEEKLY', 'MONTHLY', 'YEARLY', 'STANDALONE'].

timeOfDay.description: The start time of the assigned task.

endTimeOfDay.description: The end time of the assigned task.

dueDate.description: The due date of the assigned task.

occurrences.description: The number of occurrences of the assigned task.

complete.description: Whether the assigned task is complete.

createdAt.description: The date the assigned task was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the assigned task was updated.

typeId.description: The ID of the task type for the task.

targetId.description: The ID of the target for the task.

createdAt.description: The date the task was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the task was updated.

typeId.description: The ID of the target type for the target.

createdAt.description: The date the target was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the target was updated.

createdAt.description: The date the person was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the person was updated.

get.summary: returns a single assigned task by the provided ID.
get.description: Retrieves a single assigned task by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the assigned task to retrieve.

200.description: a single assigned task joined with its task, the task's target, and the assigned task's person.

personId.description: The ID of the person assigned to the assigned task.

taskId.description: The ID of the task for the assigned task.

type.description: The schedule type of the assigned task. In ['DAILY', 'WEEKLY', 'BIWEEKLY', 'MONTHLY', 'YEARLY', 'STANDALONE'].

timeOfDay.description: The start time of the assigned task.

endTimeOfDay.description: The end time of the assigned task.

dueDate.description: The due date of the assigned task.

occurrences.description: The number of occurrences of the assigned task.

complete.description: Whether the assigned task is complete.

createdAt.description: The date the assigned task was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the assigned task was updated.

typeId.description: The ID of the task type for the task.

targetId.description: The ID of the target for the task.

createdAt.description: The date the task was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the task was updated.

typeId.description: The ID of the target type for the target.

createdAt.description: The date the target was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the target was updated.

createdAt.description: The date the person was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the person was updated.

404.description: cannot find assigned task with provided ID

put.summary: updates an assigned task by the provided ID.
put.description: Updates an assigned task by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the assigned task to update.

404.description: Cannot update Assigned Task(s) with id={id}. Maybe Assigned Task was not found or req.body is empty!

delete.summary: deletes an assigned task by the provided ID.
delete.description: Deletes an assigned task by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the assigned task to delete.

404.description: Cannot delete Assigned Task with id={id}. Maybe Assigned Task was not found!

500.description: Could not delete Assigned Task with id={id}

put.summary: updates all occurrences of assigned tasks in a series by the provided ID.
put.description: Updates all occurrences of assigned tasks in a series by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the assigned task to update and find the series of.

404.description: Cannot update Assigned Task(s) with id={id}. Maybe Assigned Task was not found or req.body is empty!

delete.summary: deletes an assigned task and its series by the provided ID.
delete.description: Deletes an assigned task and its series by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the assigned task to delete.

404.description: Cannot delete Assigned Task with id={id}. Maybe Assigned Task was not found!

500.description: Could not delete Assigned Task with id={id}

post.summary: creates an assigned task with the provided parameters.
post.description: Creates an assigned task with the provided parameters

200.description: Returns the newly created assigned task.

id.description: ID of the assigned task that was created.

createdAt.description: The date the assigned task was created.

updatedAt.description: The date the assigned task was updated.

TaskType.description: Entity with a description and category.

category.description: The category of the task type. In [CHORE, BILL, APPOINTMENT, LIST, OTHER].

tags.name: Assigned Task
tags.description: An entity that marries a task to a date and (optionally) to a person, which can be tracked with a completion status, and can have subtasks.
